Candidate :  Justin Croston  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:   Northwest - Stockport  
 
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Postgraduate Diploma in Management. - 1999 Bristol Management Centre. University of Oxford DLE  
 
Cornwall College  - 1993 – 1997  
BTEC Higher National Certificate in Mechanical Engineering  
BTEC Ordinary National Certificate in Mechanical Engineering  
 
City and Guilds Part 2 & 3 Aircraft Engineering  - 1990 HMS Daedalus.  
 
Professional Development  
• January 2020 MEDDICC and Miller Heiman 2 days Sales Seminar.  
• July 2017 Huthwaite SPIN 2 days Sales Training.  
• May 2015 Miller Heiman 3 days Strategic Selling.  
• June 2014 Huthwaite SPIN 2 days Sales Training.  
• March 2008 Highclere 2 days Sales Presentation & C losing training.  
• March 2006 Highclere 2 days Sales Training “Repositioning the Competition” training.  
• July 2003 External Presentation 3 days Skills Course. • June 2001 Badenoch & Clark 1 week 
Telesales and Sales Skills training.  
 
 
CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
November 2020 – Present  ThingTrax Ltd  
Position: Business Development Director  
ThingTrax is a SaaS Manufacturing Performance and AI Solutions Platform, that continually optimizes 
production and key manufacturing data incl uding OEE/downtime, production planning, energy 
consumption, manual assembly, predictive/preventative maintenance, vibration/temperature monitoring 
and quality.  
 
Responsibilities:  
• Achieved £52k MRR in 2021, against a target of £48k MRR.  
• Responsible for 100% new business development, client onboarding, recruiting/training the 
SDR team, Marketing, and Client Success.  
• Average sales cycle 3 -9 months, average order value £7k MRR.  
• Achieving new client acquisitions for ThingTrax, including PVL - Groupe Plas tivaloire, Berry 
Global, WHS Plastics Ltd, RGE Group, Kernow Coatings Ltd & AMS Technical Plastics Ltd.  
 • Worked alongside a wide range of senior stakeholders including C -suite, Managing Directors, 
Plant/General Managers, Operations Directors, IT Directors , CI Directors, Procurement, and 
Legal Departments.  
• Responsible for full ownership of territory assigned to me – UK and Ireland.  
 
April 2019 – October 202 0 Concerto Integrated Software Solutions  
Position : Business Development Manager  
Concerto is a SaaS Software  House providing a web based IoT enabled Integrated Workplace 
Management platform, for both the Private and Public sectors.  
 
Responsibilities:  
• Achieved £72k MRR in first 3 quarters in 2020, against an annual target of £80k MRR.  
• Responsible for 100% new business development for both the Private, NHS and Public sectors.  
• Average sales cycle 3 -12 months, average order value £9k MRR.  
• Achieved 6 new major client acquisitions for Concerto in 3 different vertical markets, including 
Royal Berkshire NHS Founda tion Trust, Yodel, Dulux and Hampshire County Council.  
• Worked alongside a wide range of senior stakeholders including C -suite, Managing Directors, IT 
Directors, Estate Directors, Programme Managers, and Procurement/Legal Departments.  
• Responsible for fu ll ownership of territory assigned to me – UK. 
 
June 2010 – March 2019  Ascom (UK) Ltd  
Position : Senior Sales Consultant  
Ascom (UK) is a global ICT solutions provider of integrated workflow intelligence software and 
communication systems focused on Manufacturing, Healthcare, Retail and Hospitality. The vision of 
Ascom is to close digital information gaps allowing for the best possible decisions – anytime and 
anywhere.  
 
Responsibilities:  
• Consistently exceeded Ascom annual sales target of £725,000 - £900,000 every y ear whilst at 
Ascom apart from 2014 when I achieved 84%.  
• Responsible for new business development within many vertical markets including Utilities, 
Chemical, Pharmaceutical, Food/Beverage, Paper & Pulp and Aerospace.  
• Average sales cycle 3 -9 months, ave rage order value £120k.  
• Achieved new client acquisitions for Ascom including Coca Cola, GlaxoSmithKline, E -ON, 
United Utilities, AstraZeneca, Imperial Tobacco, Procter & Gamble, Unilever, Heineken UK Ltd, 
2 Sisters Food Group, Croda Ltd, SAICA Ltd, PPG A erospace and Innospec.  
• Work

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
